Name: Rider of Justice
About the game: When criminals are running free and when the justice system fails, a lone vigilante called Rider dons the mask. A new crime boss has entered the criminal underground and it is up to you to help Rider bring a stop to him and his plans. Kill and bring every criminal that stands in your way to justice! Variety of Locations Raid criminal hideouts, warehouses, mansions, and many more locations all in the pursuit of justice. Tools of the Trade Dispense justice with a submachine gun, a sawed-off shotgun, a silenced pistol, and a baseball bat. Sometimes simple is the best option. Death comes Quickly There are no bullet-sponges here. Your body armor will protect you from a couple of bullets, but you will die when you get hit a third time.
